name: Stone Idol (Demo)
description:
This is a game developed under a nudist/naturist perspective [Nudity is here depicted as something completly normal and is explicitly presente througout the entire game.], set in a fantasy world inhabited by anthropomorphic animals.

In fact, this is my second game  for the Swords and Claws franchise.

This time, we follow a new character, a rogue archer fox, as she infiltrates an ancient temple, in search for a mysterious artifact.

------------------

This is just a Demo. So please, all feedback would be welcome! ^^
